content: Configure Google Veo 3 API integration for video content generation
Configure Google Cloud Storage bucket for generated video assets
Test Veo3VideoGenerationService with real API credentials
Integrate complete AI asset pipeline: Brief → Gemini (copy) → Veo3 (video) → Creatomate (composition)
Update AIAssetPipelineOrchestrator to use Veo3 for video generation instead of mocks
Test end-to-end workflow: Campaign brief → AI-generated video content → Creatomate final render
Verify data flow between Veo3 generated videos and Creatomate template composition
Configure Creatomate templates to accept Veo3 video assets as input sources
Set up cost tracking for complete pipeline: Gemini + Veo3 + Creatomate costs
